subject: Re: Website Project Request – Landing Page Optimisations (Brookvale & Belmore)

full_threads.body:
Hi Madeleine,

I’ve updated the forms as requested—Belmore, Cleary Avenue has been removed, and Belmore, Benaroon Rd has been updated to simply Belmore.

Thanks!

Hi Cindy

Hope you are well!

I've just noticed another location that needs to be removed from the enquiry form dropdown menu;


  • We've closed 'Belmore, Cleary Avenue' (it's already been removed from Line Leader and Online Location Page)

  • We just need this location removed from the dropdown menu on the enquiry form

  • Then Belmore, Benaroon Rd can just be listed as 'Belmore' (as it is now the only location in the suburb)




Let me know if you have any questions or would like me to clarify further

Thanks so much
Madeleine Saville

Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

E: Madeleine.saville@littlescribblers.com.au
M: 0475 738 243
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

@cindy - leaving this one with you to close out.

Please ensure time is added correctly (either this ticket or another). Thank you

This ticket has been idle for over 24 hours.

If you need to respond to the client, please create a new conversation and close this ticket. Once the new ticket is created, continue the conversation there.

For guidance, refer to this walkthrough: 
  • https://www.loom.com/share/238808eaaeaa428a80a85441547b7e50?sid=1e84bd29-3621-4f82-8dac-5237bd08e5a5

Awesome, thanks!

Hi Madeleine!

Apologies for the oversight — the placeholder has now been corrected.

Thank you.

Hey Cindy

Thanks so much for looking into this! Confirming Mooroolbark is no longer showing in the dropdown menu.

One thing I did notice is a spelling error in the phone number field, can this be rectified?



Thanks so much!
Madeleine Saville

Hi Madeleine and Kasey,

I’ve rechecked all the forms on the website and removed all instances of Mooroolbark 1 from the dropdown fields.

I’ve also cleared the website cache to ensure you're seeing the most up-to-date version.

Thank you!

Hi Team!

I've gone ahead and removed these locations from LineLeader entirely, so they'll no longer appear as connection options.


I am wondering if on the webpage side, id the Centre Id's have been removed? cindy@wolfiq.com.au are you able to confirm?

Kind Regards

Kasey Todd Senior Customer Operations Advocate

Phone | (07) 3185 5115

www.lineleader.com/en-au

Hi Kasey

Thanks so much for looking into this for us!

We can still see Mooroolbark 1 as an option on the enquiry page, is there something further we need to do on the website end to see this removed from the dropdown menu?

Thanks so much
Madeleine Saville

Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

Hi Team,

Not a worry at all. I have located where this was still connected and removed the connection now.


Let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with.

Kind Regards

Kasey Todd Senior Customer Operations Advocate

Phone | (07) 3185 5115

www.lineleader.com/en-au

Hi Cindy

Thanks for confirming,

Looping in our account manager Kasey from Line Leader for this one.

ktodd@lineleader.com - we need to remove the location Mooroolbark 1 from the drop down menu on our enquiry form located here on our website, as we are no longer moving forward with this location. It appears to be embedded via an iframe, which our web devs don't have direct access to. Is this something you can assist with?

Thanks so much
Madeleine Saville

Social Media & Marketing Content Coordinator
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

E: Madeleine.saville@littlescribblers.com.au
M: 0475 738 243
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Hi Madeleine.

I’ve checked the form on the backend, and it appears to be embedded via an iframe, which we don’t have direct access to.

If you could share the credentials for the CRM where the form was created, we’d be happy to update the dropdown choices for you.

Thanks.

Hi Cindy,

Thank you so much for updating the imagery - it's looking great!

I just noticed that we've received an enquiry for the Mooroolbark location, which we had you remove earlier this month. I realised I hadn't mentioned that this location also needs to be removed from the dropdown options on our enquiry form here: https://littlescribblers.com.au/enquire/.

Would it be possible to remove the dropdown option labelled "Mooroolbark 1" from that page?

Really appreciate your help - thanks again!

Warm regards,
Madeleine Saville

We have updated the images for Beaconsfield page.

Let me know if there are other adjustments needed.
